title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk the eggs, cheeses, and pepper in a bowl.
Toss the pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve with more cheese and pepper on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked.
Cook onions and tomatoes in a pan with curry powder.
Add cream and simmer until thick.
Serve the chicken in the sauce with rice.
